author: IGN
description: In 1880s Wyoming, recently orphaned Lucas Hollister (Patrick Scott McDermott) accidentally kills a rancher and is sentenced to hang. In a twist of fate, his estranged grandfather, the notorious outlaw Harland Rust (Academy Award nominee Alec Baldwin), breaks him out of jail and takes him on the run toward Mexico. As they flee across the unforgiving wilderness, the fugitive pair must outrun the determined U.S. Marshal Wood Helm (Josh Hopkins) and a ruthless bounty hunter named “Preacher” (Travis Fimmel).
title: Rust - Official Trailer (2025) Alec Baldwin, Frances Fisher, Josh Hopkins

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Naughty Dog's Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet doesn't have an official release date, but according to Bloomberg, the game may not make it out until 2027 at the earliest. That would make it seven years into the life of the PlayStation 5, and there's a good chance Sony will have already announced the PS6. Could Intergalactic be withheld from the current-gen PS5 and be a launch title for the PS6? And would that mean Naughty Dog has missed the PS5 generation entirely, outside of remakes and remasters? Speaking of release dates, CD Projekt has confirmed that the upcoming The Witcher 4 will not be released earlier by the end of 2026, which means another 2027 release date at the earliest. And finally, Nintendo has one last Direct aimed specifically at the Switch 1, a week before the big Switch 2 reveal in April. We may finally get the deep dive on Metroid Prime 4 that we've been waiting for.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet Could Miss the PS5 Generation - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Sniper Elite: Resistance trailer to see gameplay from the Vercors Vendetta DLC. The Vercors Vendetta mission and weapons pack features the Vercors Vendetta campaign mission, M1941 rifle, and the Armaguerra OG-44 submachine gun. Sniper Elite: Resistance is available now on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows PC, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

Despite destroying the primary Nazi stockpile of the deadly nerve agent Kleine Blume, one final cache survived! This stash has now been loaded into artillery shells ready for an imminent launch against multiple targets throughout France. With millions of civilian lives at stake, Harry Hawker launches a daring attempt to neutralise the remaining Wunderwaffe before they can be deployed.
title: Sniper Elite: Resistance - Official Vercors Vendetta DLC Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves × CR7 trailer as legendary footballer Cristiano Ronaldo descends on South Town in the upcoming fighting game. Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) on April 24, 2025.
title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves × CR7 - Official Cristiano Ronaldo Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Double Dragon DLC Launch Trailer for River City Girls 2, an action-adventure beat-em-up game developed by WayForward. Players can now access the latest DLC to the game that brings both Billy and Jimmy Lee of Double Dragon-fame to River City Girls 2. Play as both Double Dragon fighters with VO and a new dojo master Boro to interact with. The Double Dragon DLC for River City Girls 2 is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: River City Girls 2 - Official Double Dragon DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out this exclusive Game of Thrones: Kingsroad gameplay for the upcoming story-driven action-adventure RPG set in Westeros. This new gameplay showcases some Game of Thrones: Kingsroad combat in action and features several familiar faces, including Jaime Lannister, Cersei Lannister, Varys, and more.

Explore the seven kingdoms and forge your own legacy as an illegitimate child from a small noble house in the North in Game of Thrones: Kingsroad. Thrust into action by the death of your brothers and the looming threat of winter, it's up to you to embark on a mission to restore your house to its former glory.

Game of Thrones: Kingsroad is coming soon to Early Access, with its full release on PC and mobile later this year.

#GameOfThrones #Gaming #GameOfThronesKingsroad
title: Game of Thrones: Kingsroad Gameplay (Exclusive)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Bigfoot Life demo trailer for the bigfoot adventure simulation game developed by Planet 47 Games. Players will embody the day-to-day life of Bigfoot himself by catching fish, building accommodations, and seeking mushrooms and berries to satiate hunger. Make use of Bigfoot Skills like Bigfoot Vision and Speed to evade Bigfoot human hunters. Bigfoot Life is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo available now.

#Gaming #Games #BigfootLife
title: Bigfoot Life - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Tougen Anki reveal trailer for this upcoming RPG adaptation of the Japanese TV anime. Tougen Anki will be available on mobile and PC in 2025.

#Gaming #Games #TougenAnki
title: Tougen Anki - Official Game Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Cinematic Reveal Trailer for Final Sentence, a fast-paced typing battle royale game developed by Button Mash. Players will go up against 100 players to type specific actions precisely to rise above the opposition. One mistake and it could be the last as players go head-to-head with the same text prompt to see who can type the fastest. Final Sentence is launching in Summer 2025 for PC (Steam).

#FinalSentence #Gaming #IGN
title: Final Sentence - Official Cinematic Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Honor of Kings is one of the most played games in the world. Taking the number one spot in the Chinese MOBA charts, the TiMi Group is taking its free-to-play characters – and world – in a new direction with Honor of Kings: World. While its scale and monetization screech in dissonance, its flashy combat, diverse roster of playable classes, and multiplayer-flexible modes do carry some promise. Previewed by Charlie Wacholz

#IGN #Gaming
title: Honor of Kings: World Leaves MOBA Behind for Action

author: IGN
description:
As the developers describe it, and you'll see from the trailer, "Quite a Ride is a survival horror game with a unique twist—you traverse a rural landscape on a bicycle, relying on pedaling to keep your smartphone charged. If the battery dies, the unnatural mist surrounding you will consume you." Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3166050/Quite_a_Ride/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Quite a Ride: Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Shia LaBeouf and Toby Kebbell star in an emotional, action-packed film about a prize fighter’s battles both inside and outside the ring. When a battered boxer past his prime finds his dreams and his relationships on the ropes, he falls back in with a dangerous crowd and has to take the biggest swing of his life to reclaim his hope and his family.

From directors Bjorn Franklin and Johnny Marchetta, Salvable is in theaters and on digital and On Demand on May 2, 2025.
title: Salvable - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Shia LaBeouf, Toby Kebbell

author: IGN
description:
Here's the No Man's Sky: Relics trailer. This new No Man's Sky update lets players become palaeontologists and dig up the skeletal remains of alien creatures. Discover bones, piece them together, and display your collections for others to see in your very own museums. But beware, dangerous creatures guard these treasures, from Stone Ghosts to huge Stone Golems.

The No Man's Sky: Relics update is available to download and play on PC, consoles, and VR for free today. It also arrives alongside a community expedition, challenging players to compete for the rarest finds. Get a look at what to expect in the latest No Man's Sky trailer.

#NoMansSky #Gaming #Games
title: No Man's Sky: Relics - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Waka waka waka! Watch the Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble trailer for the reveal that the iconic PAC-MAN joins the puzzle platformer game in a new collaboration coinciding with the 45th anniversary of PAC-MAN. For the PAC-MAN collaboration with Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble, in-game bananas will be transformed into PAC-MAN’s iconic pellets, a bunch of bananas will turn into cherry, and the golden bananas will turn into a power pellet. 

A new 2.20 update is also live, adding a new stage, Floral Ring, for the Robot Smash battle mode, alongside additional adjustments and bug fixes.

#SuperMonkeyBallBananaRumble #PacMan #Gaming
title: Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble - Official Pac-Man Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
InZOI let me see my future... and it was bleak! Wouldn’t we all like to know what our future looks like? Well, I decided to take a sneak peek at mine and walk in the shoes of 50-year-old me for a day via InZoi, the new life sim competitor out of Korea looking to take The Sims on at its own game. Get a look at the InZOI character creator and some fun InZOI gameplay in our video.

#InZOI #Gaming #Games
title: InZOI Turned My Life to Sh*t

author: IGN
description:
AI Limit reviewed by Travis Northup on PlayStation 5, also available on PC.

AI Limit is a soulslike without any soul, providing 30 mediocre hours of dodge rolling and sword swinging that’s good for little more than filling time. I sliced my way through repetitive goons in unremarkable locations, killed some pushover bosses who were dead before I thought to learn their names, and spent more time recovering from game crashes than learning anything noteworthy about the bland sci-fi setting or the characters within it. The stylish art style, smart Sync Rate system, and swappable abilities are interesting tweaks to the blueprint, but are ultimately too minor to leave much of an impression. If you’re really hurting for more opportunities to scratch that soulslike itch, you could probably do worse than AI Limit, but you could also easily do a whole lot better.
title: AI Limit Review

author: IGN
description:
Wreckfest 2 Early Access reviewed by Luke Reilly on PC.

"As a huge fan of developer Bugbear since the original FlatOut in 2004, Wreckfest 2 is definitely already speaking my language – and it really does feel great when you’re in the thick of it, crashing and carving your way through rival cars and destructible scenery on a scale I’ve never seen before. The slim amount of content and abundant crashes to desktop in the early access launch, however, make Wreckfest 2 in its current form more of an investment in what’s to come than an imperative you should change course to experience today. It leaves a mark on first impact, but a few sessions later and I feel like I’ve squeezed all the fun I’m going to glean out of it for now."
title: Wreckfest 2 Early Access Review

author: IGN
description: Check out the Matchmaking Update Trailer for Among Us, the hit social deduction game developed by Innersloth. Players will now have the ability to matchmake unlike ever before with the inclusion of filters to tune lobbies in a specific way. Lobbies will show the settings in a given match and filter the matchmaking process by Game Type, Map, Number of Imposter, and more. The Matchmaking Update for Among Us is available now.
title: Among Us - Official Matchmaking Update Trailer
